channel.title: browser on OWASP ZAP
channel.description: Recent content in browser on OWASP ZAP

item.title: ZAP Browser Launch
item.description: We have just released a new feature for ZAP that allows you to launch browsers from within ZAP. The browsers are automatically configured to proxy via ZAP and ignore certificate warnings, making it much easier for people to get started with ZAP as well as for more experienced users who want to use ZAP with a variety of browsers.
